name: Cloud Browser
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y software-properties-common && sudo add-apt-repository ppa:mozillateam/ppa -y && echo 'Package: *\nPin: release o=LP-PPA-mozillateam\nPin-Priority: 1001' | sudo tee /etc/apt/preferences.d/mozilla-firefox && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y firefox && mkdir -p /workspaces/$(basename $CODESPACE_NAME)/.mozilla && ln -s /workspaces/$(basename $CODESPACE_NAME)/.mozilla /home/vscode/.mozilla
